response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which holds immense value for us at $10,000. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its worth to you at $8,000, I propose a fair offer of $9,500. This price not only ensures a mutually beneficial transaction but also allows us to cover our costs and maintain our commitment to excellence. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 9500}
